p: Results of this model showed that the group treated with the vehicle (5% tween 80, 10 mL/kg) presented 89% gastric emptying. The groups treated with loperamide (5 mg/kg, p.o.) and (-)-fenchone at doses of 75, 150 and 300 mg/kg reduced gastric emptying to 54% ( P < 0.01), 76% ( P < 0.01), 61% ( P < 0.001) and 57% ( P < 0.001), respectively, when compared to the negative control group (Figure 1).
